casebody.data:
Cleveland E. COLEY, Jr., and Wife Sharon Coley, and Edwin Davis
v.
CHAMPION HOME BUILDERS CO. F/K/A CHB Merger Corp., and Redman Homes, Inc. F/K/A Redman Mobile Homes, Inc. No. 101P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2004. J. Scott Hale, J. Alexander S. Barrett, Greensboro, for Champion Home Builders Co. et al. Gary Shipman, William G. Wright, Wilmington, for Coley et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 3rd day of March 2004 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th day of June 2004."
